datoCmsEvent.title: Monthly Workshop Series: Cultivating Care for Creatives: An Online Writing Workshop w/ Key and Founder of the Starfruit Project Briyana D. Clarel

children.value: How can we take care of ourselves and our communities in order to thrive? In this hour-long session, weâ€™ll use guided writing activities to reflect on our care practices. This space centers healing and growth. All levels of experience are welcome.

Briyana D. Clarel is a Black queer writer, theatre artist, and educator passionate about mangoes, musical theatre, and memoirs. They are the founder of The Starfruit Project, a platform highlighting creativity for radical healing and brilliant growth. In the BeforeTimes, you could find Briyana in Philly drinking taro bubble tea, doing sketch comedy, or hanging out with ferns. Keep up @briyanclarel and briyanaclarel.com
